titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Akaka. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs for the 110th Congress.
